reviews.review:
Не советую покупать, лучше купите оригинал. Не портите себе настроение.
Минусы:
- [spoiler]Текнакли[/spoiler] не наносят урона ,хотя по сути они должный чуть ли не убивать с одного удара
- Оружие отполировано до блеска! Оно отражает ВСЕ, как зеркало!
- Если в некоторых комнатах выключить свет, пол тоже будет зеркальным.
- САМЫЙ БОЛЬШОЙ МИНУС: На локации где [spoiler]конвееры[/spoiler],начинается полная жесть, сперва можно испугаться, но небойтесь, с пк у вас все в порядке. На экране происходит полная жесть, как будто Фримен смешал отбеливатель и ко**ин
Плюсы:
- Можно купить только для контента в Garry's Mod
- Когда кто-то умирает на его месте остается ragdoll (физическая кукла)
- Ну здесь графон на несколько уровней лучше
It's good, but if you can I recommend to get Black Mesa
Its good there is some glitches but I don't mind them but play the original Half life if your starting out.

EDIT: Don't make my mistake. Play the original or Black Mesa. Don't play this port.

Very dated in the graphics department (Make sure you don't go halfway through the game without switching on the "HD where possible" option in the visual settings like I did) but otherwise a solid shooter. Constantly offering new mechanics right up until the last level, challenging enough and with an intriguing story which is told in an organic and believable way. Shooting is satisfying, Music is great and you can blow up some spod's food in the microwave on the first level. good stuff. Only gripe is that it could maybe have been trimmed a bit. I wouldn't usually gripe about a game being too long, of all things, but there's a sparsity of story developments in the middle-3/4 part that makes it lose momentum a bit. Apart from that, I must acknowledge this game's commendable experimentation and innovation, without which we wouldn't have the games we do today. Very impressive for a game from 1998, to say the least.

Still a good game after all these years!
Only one problem so far. The graphics glitch on the conveyor belts when you get near big pots on "Residue Processing". I got through by look down at my feet on the belt and then strafing on to a belt below.

Yılların eskitemediği oyun.Hikayesi,kurgusu,müzikleri ve en önemlisi olağanüstü bölüm tasarımları ile tam bir şaheser.Hala oynamayan var ise valve'ın bu müthiş şaheserini tavsiye ederim, kesinlikle size daha önce yaşamadığınız bir oyun tecrübesi yaşatacak.Önceden bir çok kez oynadıysanız bile yine de alınıp tekrar bir oynanmalı derim cidden buna değiyor.Ben küçükken farklı yollardan edinip almıştım malum o zamanlar ülkemizde orjinal oyun alışkanlığı yoktu ancak şimdi orjinal olarak alıp hakkını vermek lazım.

no

The reason i say no is because it is buggy as all hell! Its like Oblivion or Far Cry 2. The game had given the water, lighting, explosions and blood have been updated, and i believe faster movement. Unlike CS:S or DOD:S the models have not been updated so its their not-aged-well models, and better aged models with hd models. But i like that they added chapters rather than me molesting the game files. And then there is the glitch of the game that makes me throw up, what is it? Its bright, yellow and orange, textures/sprites. Then there is the glitchy sounds with the hd models. And thats why i say no for this game. (Also those who are sensitive with flashing/eye bleeding images then DEFINITELY PLAY THE ORIGINAL!)

Greetings!


But in all seriousness, don't play this over the original game. It's gotten extremely buggy and broken over the years as Valve updated the Source engine and they've done nothing to fix it, so much so that it's become a meme in the HL fanbase. If you want HL1 in the Source engine just get Black Mesa instead.

Only real advantage to having this is mounting it into Garry's Mod.

Обзор пишу на Half-Life: Source, на Steam-версию.
Оригинальная Халфа - 9/10. Source - 7/10. "Почему?" - Да потому что это АД, а не "УЛУТШОННАЯ ВЕРСИЯ НА НОВАМ ДВИШКЕ". Графические и геймплейные проблемы портили впечатление о Сурсе на протяжении всех 15 часов прохождения: лом выглядит так, будто сделан из цветного стекла, огнестрельное оружие как будто полито зеркальным покрытием, в арке про "отходы", в моменте попрыгушек по конвейерам, началась форменная визуальная наркомания - проходившие Сурс поймут. И ведь это не моя проблема; отнюдь, так у всех. Тоже самое касается, к примеру, сцены в каньоне, где нужно бы снести вертолет с помощью РПГ, но ракеты ПРОСТО ПРОЛЕТАЮТ СКВОЗЬ НЕГО! В Зене-Ксене один из мобов плюётся некой гадостью, и вместо следов от плевков на карте появляются чёрные квадраты. Вода выглядит как ртуть, что не критично, но выглядит странновато. Или взять момент, когда окружающие предметы, здания и мобы многократно накладывались друг на друга при попытке повернуть камеру вверх (похоже на знаменитые рисунки из окон ошибок в Винде, по-другому объяснить крайне затруднительно).
И, если забыть о всех пагубных последствиях СтимПайпа, испортивших эту конкретную версию (насколько я понял, именно он сломал Стим-версию ХЛ:Сурса), Халф-Лайф - отличная игра. То есть даже сказать нечего, настолько это классика. Да, графон выглядит устаревшим, а геймплей предельно прост: прыгай-бегай вперед из точки А в точку Б, параллельно отстреливаясь от врагов... Но все сделано крайне качественно. Разработчики Valve выдали игру, устроившую революцию ПК-гейминга. А вот конкретно к Source-версии есть немало претензий. Неужели Valve не знают, что их игра имеет такое количество критичных багов и недоработок, если продают ее за те же деньги, что и оригинал, и никак при этом проблемы не пытаются решить? А может им по×ер? Видимо по×ер. Грустно.
good
its good and because its running on the half life 2 engine the AI are smarter and the graphics are better

The gunplay is very fun, aside from this though the game is not. The levels are bland and all look the same until the end of the game, yet somehow those levels are still ridiculously boring. I found myself absorbed into the game because it felt satisfying to play, however there are many levels that are lacking in bombastic action pieces, though sometimes the large scale action pieces get boring themselves. The story is lacking. There are about four characters in this game, the scientist/guards who are motivated by just wanting to survive, the military who just want to kill everyone, the aliens who just want to kill everyone, and Gman who doesn't really do anything until the last seconds of the game. There is no story besides Freeman having to escape/kill everything on the way. The game lasts too long as well. If you, like I was, are looking to experience why Half-Life is such a beloved and worshiped series, I suggest starting with Half-Life 2, I haven't beat it, or played any of the "Episodes", but it has been so far everything I enjoyed about Half-Life but with a better story with actual characters and conflicts, and the physics system is incredibly fun to play with.

The original Half-Life has not aged well, I would not recommend it for play in 2020, not even as a retrospective into the "classics."

3/10

Resumiendo: Compra Black Mesa.

Este juego por sí solo no está del todo mal, pero el problema es que es peor que Half-Life y mucho peor que Black Mesa.

Básicamente, esto es una adaptación de Half-Life al motor de Half-Life 2. Parece que únicamente se han limitado a importar todos los datos de Half-Life al nuevo motor y arreglar alguna cosilla. Uno de sus problemas es que las nuevas físicas "estropean" algunas partes del juego por lo que, ya de entrada, este juego es peor que Half-Life.

Y, claro está, luego tenemos la adaptación no oficial. Black Mesa es todo lo que debería haber sido Half-Life: Source y bastante más. Aunque también tiene sus problemas, Black Mesa es mucho mejor juego que Half-Life: Source.

Mi conclusión es que tengas en tu colección el Half-Life original (y sus expansiones), el Black Mesa y te olvides de que este juego ha existido.

Kötü bir sürüm maalesef.Orijinal oyunun bir kaç "fark edilmeyen" grafik ayarı ile değiştirilmiş ve bir kaç işlevsel ama eski özellik getirilmiş versiyonu diyebiliriz.Malum bir kaç değişiklik var ama oyun eski olduğu için günümüzde fark edilmiyorlar bile.Tabi kayıt sistemi çok rahat ama orijinal oyunda çok kısa ve sık olan Save noktaları bu sürümde oldukça uzun ve sıkıcı.Zaten 22 yıl önce yapılan bir oyunda buna da çok aldırmassınız.Eğer dijital bir koleksiyoncu veya sadece kütüphanesinde ki oyun sayısını arttırmak isteyen bir kullanıcı iseniz indirim de 1 TL gibi oldukça cüzi bir fiyata alınabilir.Ancak dediğim gibi orijinal oyunla aynı.İsminde ki Source kelimesine aldırmayın.Source ama Gold Source.Eğer Half-life'ı rafine bir biçimde deneyim etmek isterseniz Black Mesa gibi muhteşem bir alternetifi var.Onu alın deneyin.

Although quite dated, I understand why this game is an absolute classic. The story is good, the developments that this game made for the industry at the time were amazing, and it was overall a fun play. Now obviously this game has not aged the best, the graphics are very flat, the controls can be rough at times, and sound quality is an issue that constantly bothered me. Despite this I would definitely play this game again, I am not sure how to explain it, but the world this game builds is so engrossing and the story compliments it so well. Despite it's age I still think it holds up well today, and I believe that it is an essential game for every PC gamer to have.

8.5/10

Time to choose.

Um clássico! É um jogo que merece ser jogado com calma, aproveitando os diálogos soltos pelo decorrer do game e sentar o dedo no mouse pra matar os mercenários e alienígenas. 
.
Levando em conta que o game é do final da década de 90, os gráficos e jogabilidade foram um marco! O enredo não é lá TOP igual o Half-Life 2, mas vale ser jogado sem pressa, para entender o que aconteceu na BLack Mesa e que desencadeou os cenários de HALF-LIFE 2 e seus episódios de expansão. 
.
HALF LIFE 1 é um game que merece uma chance de ser jogado, aproveitado e nunca esquecido.
